attributes.action: Introduce on the election ballot paper another box.
attributes.additional_details:
No one from the votes in this box can be elected.
This is our democratic right to vote on election and our right to vote how we vote.
attributes.background:
People have lost faith in the government.
This box will state I cast my vote in this box as I cannot vote for any candidates or any party's on this paper.
The votes from this box cannot go to any candidates or any party's but counted for the people of this country.
